title: Spielberg's Lincoln and a new look at Jane Austen
itunes:title: Spielberg's Lincoln and a new look at Jane Austen
itunes:subtitle: Adam Smith offers a historian's perspective on the new Lincoln film, while Paula Byrne explores the life of Jane Austen on the 200th anniversary of Pride and Prejudice
description:
Adam Smith offers a historian's perspective on the new Lincoln film, while Paula Byrne explores the life of Jane Austen on the 200th anniversary of Pride and Prejudice

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
